column14: What it covers
Defining overall system structure, components, interfaces, and constraints to meet business and technical requirements
Designing software components, modules, data structures, and interactions before implementation
Designing network topologies, protocols, capacity, and connectivity to support system requirements
Designing compute, storage, and platform infrastructure (on-prem or cloud)
Designing physical hardware components and systems, including boards, chips, and devices
Design and optimisation of RF systems, antennas, and wireless communication components
Writing, testing, and maintaining application code using appropriate languages and frameworks
Integrating hardware, software, and subsystems into a functioning whole and managing builds
Managing software versions, configurations, environments, and deployment readiness
Developing time-critical and resource-constrained systems such as IoT and control systems
Developing animations and interactive visual components for applications, games, or simulations
Verifying that system functions behave as specified according to requirements
Testing performance, security, usability, scalability, and reliability
Validating development and operational processes against standards and regulations
Applying lifecycle models (e.g. Agile, DevOps, V-model) across development and deployment
Planning, monitoring, and controlling system development activities and resources
Managing product vision, roadmap, prioritisation, and value delivery
Designing systems to prevent hazards and ensure safe operation
Assessing and certifying system safety against standards and regulations
Managing data lifecycle, governance, quality, and accessibility
Designing logical and physical data models aligned with system needs
Designing databases, schemas, indexing, and storage strategies
Analysing datasets to extract insights and support decision-making
Applying statistical and computational techniques to complex data problems
Developing, training, evaluating, and deploying machine learning models
Developing dashboards, reports, and analytics platforms for business users
Building data pipelines, ETL processes, and scalable data platforms
Designing visual representations of data to support interpretation and insight
Collecting qualitative and quantitative user insights to inform design
Designing end-to-end customer journeys and service experiences
Ensuring systems are usable by people with diverse abilities and needs
Analysing user behaviour, usability issues, and interaction patterns
Designing interfaces, interactions, and workflows
Evaluating designs through usability testing and feedback
Creating structured, user-focused digital content
Managing publication, workflows, and distribution of content
Capturing, structuring, and sharing organisational knowledge
Designing visual assets, branding, and graphical elements
Developing mathematical and simulation models of real-world systems
Applying numerical methods to solve complex mathematical problems
Developing and optimising software for parallel and high-performance systems
